methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initialize the MCP session and negotiate capabilities.

methods.name: ping
methods.description: Health-check ping; the server replies immediately.

methods.name: tools/list
methods.description: List all tools the server exposes.

methods.name: tools/call
methods.description: Invoke a named tool with arguments.

methods.name: resources/read
methods.description: Read the content of a specific resource.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Return overall health/status of the server.

methods.name: ui/initialize
methods.description: Initialize an MCP Apps Bridge UI session.

methods.name: ui/message
methods.description: Send a message through the UI bridge.

methods.name: ui/update-model-context
methods.description: Push updated model context to the UI.

methods.name: ui/tools/call
methods.description: Call a tool within a UI session.

methods.name: notifications/initialized
methods.description: Sent by client after initialize handshake.

methods.name: notifications/progress
methods.description: Report progress for a long-running operation.
